name: Pain Train (prototype)
description:
Description

Your job is to ensure train lines operate smoothly, except you don't like your job or people.

This is a prototype from week 4 (starting 2 April 2018) of my game-a-week project where I intend to create a new game every week for a while. Also submitted to the Game in a Week #2 game jam which has a theme of "EVERYONE IS DEAD!".

Controls
  • Left mouse button: toggle track direction
